title: MLP:FIM - The Pony I Want to Be song

json.text: If I'm a diamond then why do I feel so rough
I'm as stong as a stone even that's not enough
There's something jagged in me and I've made such mistakes
I thought that diamonds were hard but I feel I could break
Would you believe that I've always wished to be some pony else
Yet I can't see what I need to do to be the pony I want to be
I've been told my whole life what to do what to say
No pony showed me that there might be some better way
And now I feel like I'm lost I don't know what to do
The ground is sinking away I'm about to fall through
Would you believe that I've always wished I could be some pony else
Yet I can't see what I need to do to be the pony I want to be
To be the pony I want to be
We'll build a playground for all of us to enjoy
so full of games there's enough for every girl and boy
I want to help and do everything that I can
I'm here to show you a change listen up here's the plan
There's so much I can do to help every pony else
I see the light that's shines in me
I know I can be my better self
I can free the past because the future's bright for me
My cutie mark is setting me free
To do what's right and be the pony I want to be
And be the pony I want to be
